_comment: image: must be of format [team/]name, do not prefix nvcr.io or org, or suffix with tag
desc: Description of image. Defaults to null
overview:  Overview of image. Defaults to null
label: Label of image. Defaults to null
label_set: Label set of image. Defaults to null - the format is a list of strings
logo: Logo of the image. Defaults to null - the format is url
publisher: Publisher of image. Defaults to null
built_by:  Name of image built by. Defaults to null
multinode: Is image multinode. Defaults to false
display_name: Display name of image. Defaults to null
